@graph.name: Sentinel5 volcanic data
@graph.description:
From Copernicus Sentinel 5P data to panoply visualization of volcanic activity impact to atmosphere

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Sentinel 5P data visualisation](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/climate/tutorials/sentinel5_data/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
